GSP28jsbh3-1u:1152: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ caturdhākaraṇamiti prāpte -------- pracuraprayogāttaddhitasya devatātva eva śaktasya saṃbandhamātralakṣakatvānupapatterna tāvadagnisaṃbandhitvasya vivakṣā /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1155: ataeva dvandvānta ityādipravādastu yatroddeśyatvena sāhityāvivakṣā tatreti dhyeyam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1163: nahi haviṣi vācye devatātaddhita eveti smṛtyā niyamyate;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1167: tena ca puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā karotī“ti sāmānyavacanasyopasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1171: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevakṛtau bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1173: <B2> pūrvādhikaraṇoktasarvārthatvāpavādādāpavādikīmanantarasaṅgatiṃ saṃśayaṃ ca spaṣṭatvādanullikhya viṣayapradarśanapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha --------- darśeti /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1175: paurṇamāsyadhikaraṇoktarītyā agnidevatātvasya kārakatāsaṃbandhena bhāvanāyāmanvayasya vyutpannatvāt dravye 'nvaye 'vyutpannānvayanibandhanavākyabhedāpattirityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1183: yathaiva 'ghaṭapaṭāvānaye' tyatra karmatvaṃ dvandvānte vibhakteḥ śrūyamāṇatvāt pratyekaṃ bhavati /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1186: tena dampatyoḥ kartṛtvasyeva devatātvasyāpyakhaṇḍopādhirūpasya vyāsaktatvāvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1187: ghaṭapaṭāvityatra tu tayoruddeśyatvena tatsāhityasyāvivakṣitatvāt tatra pratyekameva karmatvaṃ yuktamiti vaiṣamyopapādanāyāha ---------- ata eveti /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1193_0: nanu evamapi vakṣyamāṇaśātapathaśrutimūlena “ubhau vā aviśeṣādi“ti kātyāyanavacanena
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1193_1: agnīṣomīye 'pi tatprāpteḥ kathaṃ tasya āgneyamātraviṣayatāsiddhirityato niyāmakamāha
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1194: “taṃ caturdhākṛtvā puroḍāśaṃ barhiṣadaṃ karotī“ti śatapathagataṃ vākyaṃ tacchabdena puroḍāśaparāmarśena puroḍāśamātrasya caturdhākaraṇavidhāyakamevārthato dhṛtam /
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1195: etādṛśopasaṃhārānaṅgīkāre śākhāntarīyatve 'pi pratyakṣavākyavihitasya puroḍāśamātracaturdhākaraṇasya sarvathā bādhāyogāt vikalpāpattiḥ,
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1201_2: kathaṃ tasya tadviṣaye sāmānyavidhitvaṃ iti ------- vācyam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1203: etena ------ parasparopasaṃhāre sāmānyavidhisārthakyasaṃbhave 'pi anyataropasaṃhāre sāmānyavidhivaiyarthyamapi ------- parihṛtam;
GSP28jsbh3-1u:1207: viśeṣataḥ prāptatve 'pi sarvapuroḍāśapratipattitvena vidhitvasaṃbhave anuvādatvāyogāt tena viśeṣaparyavasāyitvānupapatteḥ /
